name: Infant mortality rate (IHME - 2017)
title: Infant mortality rate (IHME - 2017)
description: Number of infants (less than one year old) dying per 100,000.

sources.additionalInfo: Number of infants (less than one year old) dying per 100,000.

fields.name: Infant mortality rate
